function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transposition of activities to virtual platforms may not optimize public administration activities, but only digitize processes.","Impact":"Reduced efficiency and effectiveness of public administration activities.","Mitigation":"Implement training programs to optimize the use of virtual platforms for municipal services.","Technologies":"Virtual collaboration tools and digital management platforms.","People":"Citizens who rely on municipal services.","Owner":"Local government and municipal authorities."},{"Description":"Simple replacement of physical activities with digital processes may be a shallow level of technological impact.","Impact":"Limited improvement in public services and response to critical needs.","Mitigation":"Invest in more advanced technological solutions that go beyond simple digitization.","Technologies":"Innovative digital solutions and advanced technology integration.","People":"Citizens relying on municipal services.","Owner":"Local government and technology implementation teams."},{"Description":"Dependency on telephone exchange as a communication strategy may be anachronistic compared to digital devices.","Impact":"Limited accessibility and efficiency in communication with citizens.","Mitigation":"Integrate digital communication channels alongside telephone services for comprehensive and efficient citizen communication.","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms and customer relationship management systems.","People":"Citizens seeking information and assistance.","Owner":"Municipal authorities and communication teams."}]}
